p: The GC polysaccharide extracts free radical scavenging potential was calculated using DPPH ( Amir et al., 2011). The absorbance was measured at 515 nm by (Shimadzu UV–Vis) spectrophotometer after 10 m of room temperature incubation. The DPPH activity was recorded using Eq. (1) and ascorbic acid was used as a reference standard.
